name: Color Label
description:
Color Label Dynalist
Code by http://talk.dynalist.io/u/Rodion_Y
http://talk.dynalist.io/t/customize-color-labels-w-stylish/623
additional_info:
Color Label Dynalist


**How to use ?**
    1. Installed Stylish Chrome extension : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish-custom-themes-for/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe?hl=en
    2. Installed Color Label : https://userstyles.org/styles/155911/color-label
    3. Open  https://dynalist.io/d
    4. Click Stylish extension, Activate "Color Label"
    5. Move cursor on the text
    6. Click "Ctrl + Shift + L"
    7. Click "Ctrl + Shift + L" again to change label color
